reasoning: Orthokeratinized odontogenic cyst (OOC) is a specific subtype of odontogenic cysts, representing ~2-5% of all odontogenic lesions. Estimated incidence ~0.8 per 100k based on dental epidemiological studies. Limited large-scale epidemiological data; confidence moderate due to reliance on smaller cohort studies and regional registries.
source: Dental epidemiological literature; limited global surveillance
